goal.ch: 本課程目標主要希望透過《近思錄》之經典導讀及討論，以引導同學對於北宋四子諸如周敦頤、張載、程顥、程頤等儒者之論點有深一層之思想掌握，又以朱子思想為主，討論程朱陸王二系的不同及其會通之道，進而在此有機性的思想展開下，幫助同學對於宋明理學之整體思維結構有一清楚而真確之理解。
goal.en: The main purpose of this course is to guide and discuss the classic of the Book of Jin Si Lu.Let students to have a deep understaning of the argument of the four theorists Zhou Dunyi, Chen Hao, Chen Yi and Zhang Zai in North Song Dynasty.Further, under this organic idea to help stundents have a clear and true understanding of the overall thinking structure of Neo-Confucianism of Song and Ming Dynasties.

outline.ch: 本課程 前階段將依天道、心性、工夫三種視角，以歷史發展之步驟分別討論北宋四子的天道思想發展成心性論架構之後，最後如何形成一套其自身之工夫實踐系統。在每一次的系列討論之後，開放多元討論北宋四子理論之優缺及發展軌跡。課程架構將以定靜工夫實踐系統作為貫通文本之主軸。
outline.en: This course will be based on the three perspectives: the Way of Heaven, Human Nature and Self-cultivation.Taking the steps of historical development, we discuss separately the development of the Way of Heaven to the Theories of Human Nature in the four theorists of North Song Dynasty.And finally, form a Self-cultivation system of its own.After each series of discussions.Open multivariate discussion of the advantages, disadvantages and development trajectory of the four theorists of North Song Dynasty.
